alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Greenwood (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 2:44PM EDT until August 15 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Abbeville County in Upstate South Carolina... Greenwood County in Upstate South Carolina... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 243 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southwest of Abbeville, or 4 miles east of Calhoun Falls, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Greenwood, Abbeville, Calhoun Falls, Troy, Promised Land, Bradley, Coronaca, Kirksey, Epworth and Richard B Russell Dam. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
